title: cant ban!!!
body:
so i was waiting for my 20 min wait to be up and then the first game i entered I tried to ban yasuo but it wont work, the ban button just flashes and then reappears with the sound, this has gottten me penalties for queue dodging.

Plz fix this Riot{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It sounds like your computer may not be establishing a solid link to our matchmaking servers. This is most often caused by certain network configurations that conflict with League. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you aren't running one of those problematic settings.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
